headline: Two Reasons to Avoid MAR and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Marriott has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 7.8%. Its stock price has climbed to $284.63, representing a healthy 17.5% increase. This run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
